attributes.action: Use the internet and the latest social engineering to cover more issues in greater depth with more points of view
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give everyone a chance to affect the governing of the UK. The internet and other technologies are mature enough to encourage and leverage unbiased debait and decision making.

Embracing the old with the new, principles of democracy with the accumulating innovations in social engineering. For example, PM TB's recently proposed new style of government would be incomplete without such plans, but the sparse and limited  provisions to date warrant these concerns. 

The visible and power-distributing nature of such ventures would have many benefits, just a fraction being: further resistance against propaganda,  unwarranted nannying, less space for excuses, and better exposes of broken promises

Goals regarding government organisation  given these technological changes should do more to sense and respond, encourage accountability and faster change, and ultimately more appropriate, wanted decisions!
